Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.EntropyBlockingSplittableRandomAdapter
    Use EntropyBlockingReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.SplittableRandomAdapter
    In OpenJDK 8 and Android API 24 and later, ThreadLocalRandom uses the same PRNG algorithm as SplittableRandom, and is faster because of internal coupling with Thread. As well, the instance returned by ThreadLocalRandom.current() can be safely passed to any thread that has ever called current(), and streams created by a ThreadLocalRandom are safely parallel. For situations where reseeding or a specified seed is needed, use ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter (whose SimpleRandomSeeder parameter is now nullable).
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter.ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter.getInstance​(SimpleRandomSeeder, SeedGenerator)
    Callers should instead construct their own instances.
    io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom.setSeed​(long)
    Some implementations are very slow.
